Enhance the experience Fix known bugs
Urgently fix a bug that displays an outdated message
Enhanced experience and improved autosave functionality
Fix known BUG
New Tool: OCR and Stamp Maker

Newly added signature tool: located in the shortcut toolbar it allows you to sign and annotate PDF files save and share them or crop one page and place it on the main canvas as material for explanation.
Smooth lines. Add a few more pen tips Fountain pen Watercolor brush Crayon Monoline pen available on iOS 17.0 and above . Optimize other aspects.
Fix a bug and enhance the experience.

1. Add interactive learning tools for biology including DNA cells viruses and bacteria assembly to easily and naturally understand the structure of microorganisms and cells. 2. Add customizable interactive graphic tools where you can drag and drop points and ellipses to assemble various shapes.
Re professionalized localized translations with a more user friendly UI.
Improved the experience of some widgets.
Add a 2D 3D polygonal graphic that can be combined in any way.
Add several interactive puzzle objects: alarm clock piano scales and so on.
Modify a bug that flickers when mirroring on the right side of iPad in a split screen state
Optimize and modify known bugs.
Optimize and modify known bugs.
Optimized for smoother line drawing.
Optimize some UI. Solve the problem that the hot zone and visible area of buttons occasionally do not match on iPhoneOS devices with bangs.
Optimize and fix a known bug
1. Fixed a crash bug. 2. Made the instructions on the settings page clearer.

This revision uses GPT 4 technology to modify some translations that were not localized enough and modifies several interaction methods to make it clearer for users to understand the functions of the buttons.

The button of whether to hover the layer when drawing shapes is displayed in the shortcut toolbox on the canvas by default which is convenient for users to switch especially when drawing lines and arrows which sometimes need to be a hover layer and sometimes don t need to be a hover layer placed in the shortcut key for easy switching.

Fixed some known bugs. Enhance the function of suspension layer: A. Add two buttons in the lower left corner the proportional zoom button and the rotate button. B. And add a lock button in the locked state you can fix the floating layer and continue to draw lines and write on it. It can be unlocked with the long press gesture . C: According to the characteristics of the text floating layer use the double click gesture double click to enter the editing double click again to complete the editing . D: Enhanced automatic management of suspended layer levels E: Recommendations for the use of the suspension layer: 1. For layers that you do not want to be erased and it is expected that you will continue to write and draw on this layer or picture it is recommended to use the second button Lock Status Button . 2. For the layer temporarily or to be displayed in front of the canvas it is recommended to use the first button to draw directly on the canvas which can be erased by the eraser and cleaned by the trash can. Other recent updates: 1. You can directly drag image files or text from other folders to the whiteboard canvas. 2. Magnetic attraction effect: The magnetic attraction effect of the suspension layer is aligned to the right which is beneficial to alignment. When drawing straight lines and arrows and rotating close to horizontal or vertical a magnetic attraction effect occurs making the straight lines or arrows appear horizontal or vertical. 3. Add movable props to the stadium scene of the coach tactical template: You can customize the color and number of players and add them to the stadium. 4. High definition pictures: Link to a third party free copyright free high definition picture platform you can search for a large number of free high definition pictures and easily obtain them. 5. Add a suggested text box you can write text directly on the canvas.

Enhance the function of suspension layer: A. Add two buttons in the lower left corner the proportional zoom button and the rotate button. B. And add a lock button in the locked state you can fix the floating layer and continue to draw lines and write on it. It can be unlocked with a long press gesture. C: According to the characteristics of the text floating layer use the double click gesture double click to enter the editing and double click again to complete the editing. D: Strengthen the automatic management of the suspension layer level E: Recommendations for the use of the suspension layer: 1. For layers that you do not want to be erased and it is expected that you will continue to write and draw on this layer or picture it is recommended to use the second button Lock Status Button . 2. For the layer temporarily or to be displayed in front of the canvas it is recommended to use the first button to draw directly on the canvas which can be erased by the eraser and cleaned by the trash can. Other recent updates: 1. You can directly drag image files or text from other folders to the whiteboard canvas. 2. Magnetic attraction effect: The magnetic attraction effect of the suspension layer is aligned to the right which is beneficial to alignment. When drawing straight lines and arrows and rotating close to horizontal or vertical a magnetic attraction effect occurs making the straight lines or arrows appear horizontal or vertical. 3. Add movable props to the stadium scene of the coach tactical template: You can customize the color and number of players and add them to the stadium. 4. High definition pictures: Link to a third party free copyright free high definition picture platform you can search for a large number of free high definition pictures and easily obtain them. 5. Add a suggested text box you can write text directly on the canvas.

1. Stadium scene props: you can customize team colors and numbers and add them to the court. 2. HD pictures: link to a third party free copyright free HD picture platform you can search for a large number of free HD pictures easy to access. 3. Magnetism effect: draw straight lines and arrows the magnetism effect appears when approaching horizontal or vertical so that the straight line or arrow presents horizontal or vertical state. 4. Text editing with frame by default you can also choose not to add frame.

Latest updates. I m really sorry every time I update I modify some code and always arrive some unexpected bugs. this version mainly modifies a text editor can not select the text color and set the background color problem. Recent updates. 1 almost modified more than 50 of the code the purpose is to enhance the experience. 2 a new display box you can display the zoom in and out percentage two fingers can be displayed when zooming in and out. When this button is pressed it will return to 100 display. Recent updates. Modify the problem that draft paper can t draw lines in iOS 13. Recent updates. Added a new widget: a straightedge. Recent Updates. Enhanced the experience to allow erasing and clearing the screen even when opening the last edited file Recent Updates. Added a button to the toolbar that allows unlimited new layers. Recent Updates Optimized the display of the emoji page and added two new groups of emoji: Kawaii style and Christmas style. Recent Updates. 1. Add two functions to the small toolbar: simple PPT play and add emoji packs on the picture on the canvas Recent updates. 1 Enhanced file management system added: optional auto save add tags add file title functions. Recent updates. 1 Enhance the temporary draft paper function you can change the background to transparent color you can share the background template with the main canvas. 2 Add canvas templates three new templates: split shot triangle point background square point background. And you can customize various grid line spacing size in the template. Recent updates. 1 Enhance the temporary draft paper function add some gadgets outside and can add the result to the main canvas which is equivalent to adding any layer. 2 New temporary draft paper function which can be called in work or teaching for calculation and other temporary ideas. 3 In Settings four Pen Color Buttons and three Stroke Size Buttons can be customized with their default values. 4 Add a Copy button to Hover Layer to make an exact copy of the same layer.

Latest update. Fixed issue with draft paper not drawing lines on iOS 13. Recent Updates. New gadget: a straightedge Recent updates. Enhanced the experience by allowing the opening of the last edited file to also erase and clear the screen Recent updates. Added a button to the toolbar that allows unlimited new layers to be added. Recent updates Emoticons page has been optimised and two new sets of emoticons have been added: Kawaii style and Christmas style Recent Updates. 1. Added two functions to the small toolbar: minimalist PPT playback and adding emoji packs to pictures on the canvas Recent updates. 1. Enhanced file management system with new features: optional auto save add tags add file title Recent updates. 1 Enhance the temporary draft paper function you can change the background to transparent colour you can share the background template with the main canvas. 2 Add canvas templates three new templates: split shot triangle point background square point background. And you can customize the spacing size of various grid lines in the template. Recent updates. 1 Enhance the temporary draft paper function add some small tools outside and can add the result to the main canvas which is equivalent to adding any layer. 2 New temporary draft paper function can be called up at work or teaching for calculations and other temporary ideas. 3. In Settings the four Pen colour buttons and three Stroke size buttons can be customised with their default values. 4. A Copy button has been added to Hover Layer to make exact copies of the same layer.

1 A new temporary draft paper function has been added which can be called up for calculations and other ad hoc ideas during work or teaching. It disappears immediately on exit and opens as a blank sheet of paper. 2. In Settings four Pen color buttons and three Stroke size buttons can be customized with their default values. 3. Add a Copy button to the Hover Layer to make an exact copy of the same layer. 4 In Settings add a button to switch to a simplified version .

1. Four Pen Color Buttons and three Stroke Size Buttons can be customised to their default values by Long pressing them. 2 For the hover layer to add a copy button you can copy an identical layer 3. In the Settings section add a button to switch to the Simplified version.

Custom color transparency Customize the background grid size Other minor adjustments

Many adjustments have been made in this version as follows Multiple brush types: In addition to the default whiteboard pen there are pencils crayons chalk multicolored pens soft pens signature pens markers. Multiple page: pages can be added or deleted the entire current archive can be saved to the list that comes with the whiteboard and accessed at any time new archives can be added and PDFs can be imported from outside. Multi color selection customizable color opacity the first three pens can be customised by long pressing on them there is also a small customisable moveable color palette inside the color palette all brush thicknesses can be adjusted by the user. Multiple tools: coordinate system arrows lines circles cylinders triangles trigons cones quadrilaterals... etc. And all shapes can be customised with solid and dashed lines. The foregrounds can be imported from albums and can be moved around. All foreground objects can be moved rotated and resized in any position with the help of a pair of scissors . Multiple background templates: unlimited background colors blackboard various court scale drawings Chinese beige grid English divider underline checkered underline and much more are available. You can also import images from your own albums and customise them with a special background template save the background image to an album and then open it in the whiteboard as a background image. You can edit text paragraphs and customise the color size and background color as well as resizing the text box. The settings panel can be customised with a watermark or with no watermark at all plus a number of other handy actions that can be customised to suit personal preference such as Whether to allow the eraser to return automatically after working. Whether to use a long press to open the panel. Whether you want to turn on Apple Pencil to prevent accidental touches disable finger painting and only keep the pen on or turn on finger painting by drawing a long line anywhere on the canvas to resume finger painting Whether you need to turn on hover when drawing graphics to allow you to move and rotate and resize them further. One click restoration of default settings is also available. Finally there is also an export and share function.

Many adjustments have been made in this version as follows Multiple brush types: In addition to the default whiteboard pen there are pencils crayons chalk multicolored pens soft pens signature pens markers. Multiple page: pages can be added or deleted the entire current archive can be saved to the list that comes with the whiteboard and accessed at any time new archives can be added and PDFs can be imported from outside. Multi color selection the first three pens can be customised by long pressing on them there is also a small customisable moveable color palette inside the color palette all brush thicknesses can be adjusted by the user. Multiple tools: coordinate system arrows lines circles cylinders triangles trigons cones quadrilaterals... etc. And all shapes can be customised with solid and dashed lines. The foregrounds can be imported from albums and can be moved around. All foreground objects can be moved rotated and resized in any position with the help of a pair of scissors . Multiple background templates: unlimited background colors blackboard various court scale drawings Chinese beige grid English divider underline checkered underline and much more are available. You can also import images from your own albums and customise them with a special background template save the background image to an album and then open it in the whiteboard as a background image. You can edit text paragraphs and customise the color size and background color as well as resizing the text box. The settings panel can be customised with a watermark or with no watermark at all plus a number of other handy actions that can be customised to suit personal preference such as Whether to allow the eraser to return automatically after working. Whether to use a long press to open the panel. Whether you want to turn on Apple Pencil to prevent accidental touches disable finger painting and only keep the pen on or turn on finger painting by pressing and holding anywhere on the canvas for 3 seconds. Whether you need to turn on hover when drawing graphics to allow you to move and rotate and resize them further. One click restoration of default settings is also available. Finally there is also an export and share function.

ust for the better. Recent Support use Multitasking on your iPad Support working with two apps in Split View On your iPad with iOS 11 or later you can use Multitasking to work with two apps at the same time if the other app support too. Add a zoom function x2 call it in the button can expand the current canvas length and width by a factor of two. Add a realistic blackboard background. Add an Apple Pencil mode switch between finger and Apple Pencil touches For preventing mistakenly touching when use the Apple Pencil When you first draw with apple pencil it open by default. Note: You can call it in the button by yourself. This function is only suitable for iPad. Significantly increase the opening speed now open in a second Optimize the picture mosaic function now the mosaic can be undone or erased. Improve performance draw lines faster no delays at any time. Optimize the UI again. Text function: You can adjust the font color and size by adjusting the brush color and size. Added a redo function Added the ability to choose up to 6 colors for your default color palette Optimized UI for more streamlined creations. Now you can simple click to get access to all of your tools and shapes. The app will also allow you to continue using your shapes until you switch tools. Added shape tools arrows lines squares circles etc. Added text function Quick hide all of your tools to have a blank screen to draw on Shake your device to automatically save your high definition creation to your Camera Roll Choose from unlimited colors for your markers Coaching board! Import sports fields templates to draw plays baseball football basketball rugby volleyball badminton and more to come! Apple Pencil integration double tap to use as an eraser

Just for the better. Added a redo function Added the ability to choose up to 6 colors for your default color palette Optimized UI for more streamlined creations. And add some sketch map of ball field as background: baseball softball ice hockey handball basketball football volleyball rugby badminton England rugby etc. Others updates recent: 1. Now the whiteboard can remember you last selected brush color line size and the background of the canvas. 2. Add a button to hide all other buttons which is located in the upper right corner. Now there is only one button left in the whole paper if you want. It s cool for users to immerse themselves in work. 3. Add Apple Pencil Simply double tap to erasures the eraser. 4. The base map can zoom in and out. 5.Brush color can further choose unlimited colors. 6.The background color can further select unlimited colors. 7.Further selection of stroke size allows you to customize more sizes. 8.
